slogan.mission: Database change and version control for DBAs and Developers

pricing.announcement: You can upgrade, downgrade, or {cancel} anytime. No hidden charges.

free.title: Free
free.desc: Personal project or small team, no DBA

team.title: Team
team.label: Beta
team.desc: Medium size team, has dedicated DBA or TL for engineering velocity

enterprise.title: Enterprise
enterprise.label: Early access
enterprise.desc: Large organization, has dedicated DBA group to manage database fleet

features.sync-members-from-vcs: Sync project membership from the linked GitLab project

main-features.review-workflow: Schema and data change review workflow
main-features.im-integration: IM integration (e.g. Slack, Discord and etc)
main-features.sql-check-anomaly-detection: Advanced SQL check and anomaly detection

sql-review.title: SQL Review
sql-review.description: A dedicated review workflow and UI for Developers and DBAs to collaborate on schema changes. Assisted by built-in advisor such as backward compatibility checks.

database-as-code.title: Database-as-Code
database-as-code.description: Integrate with VCS hosting the migration scripts. Migration pipeline is triggered on observing new script push event.

streamlined-deployment.title: Streamlined Deployment
streamlined-deployment.description: Support multi-tenant (M), multi-environment (N) schema change in a single M*N change matrix pipeline.

sql-editor.title: SQL Editor
sql-editor.description: Easy-to-use query interface to SELECT database records.

migration-history.title: Migration History
migration-history.description: Record the full migration history with side-by-side diff comparison between versions.

anomaly-center.title: Anomaly Center
anomaly-center.description: Periodically scan all managed instances and databases and provide user a holistic view to see all anomalies.

drift-detection.title: Drift Detection
drift-detection.description: Automatically detect schema drift by comparing the recorded schema and actual schema. Catch any unexpected schema changes.

backup-and-restore.title: Backup and Restore
backup-and-restore.description: Per-database automatic and manual backup. Environment specific backup schedule policy. Restore to new database with the entire restored migration history chain.

role-based-access-control.title: Role-based Access Control
role-based-access-control.description: Two role set. Owner, DBA, Developer for workspace. Owner, Developer for project.

banner.announce-bytebase-1-0-and-our-team-plan: Announce Bytebase 1.0 and our Team Plan

subscribe.learn-product-updates-and-everything-abo: Learn product updates and everything about database.
subscribe.check-email-to-confirm-subscription: Now check {email} to confirm the subscription.
